</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds a backpack for a unit. If a unit already has a backpack, the old backpack will be placed on the ground under the unit.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value>
Classname list of available backpacks:
* [[ArmA 2 OA: Backpacks|Arma 2 OA backpacks]]
* [[Arma 3 CfgVehicles EMPTY|Arma 3 backpacks]] - objects starting with "B_", starts with "''B_AssaultPack_khk''"
</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit [[addBackpack]] backpackClassName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> packClassName: [[String]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
